com.vector.cfg.consistency.groovy.api

Interface IValidationApi


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IValidationApi
    The main interface for validation.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IValidationResultCreationApi getResultCreation()
      Returns the IValidationResultCreationApi to create IValidationResult in script task, which provide a resultSink.
      ISolver getSolver()
      getSolver() gives access to the ISolver API, which has advanced methods for bulk solutions.

    • Method Detail

      • getResultCreation

        @PublishedMethod
IValidationResultCreationApi getResultCreation()
        Returns the IValidationResultCreationApi to create IValidationResult in script task, which provide a resultSink.

        Note: this is only possible during script task execution, and when the script task provides a resultSink.

        Returns:
        the result creation API
        See Also:
        IValidationResultCreationApi

      • getSolver

        @PublishedMethod
ISolver getSolver()
        getSolver() gives access to the ISolver API, which has advanced methods for bulk solutions.
        Returns:
        the solver

      • getValidationResults

        @PublishedMethod
java.util.Collection<IValidationResultUI> getValidationResults()
        getValidationResults() waits for background-validation-idle and returns all validation-results of any kind.

        This method returns live results, on-demand (generation) results, consistency-runtime-error results and any other kind of results that may be defined in the future.

        This method waits for the live-background validation to be idle in order to have reproducible results. If this is not wanted for some reason, e.g. it is known that a particular result is already created and published, getValidationResultsNow() can be used.

        Returns:
        the validation results

      • getValidationResultsNow

        @PublishedMethod
java.util.Collection<IValidationResultUI> getValidationResultsNow()
        Returns all validation-results of any kind.

        This method is similar to getValidationResults() except that it does not wait for background-validation-idle, and hence some results may or may not be already in the returned collection, depending on the kind, validator-configuration, timing,... Use this method only if you know these details.

        Returns:
        the validation results

      • resultCreation

        @PublishedMethod
void resultCreation(@VDelegatesToWithClosureParam(value=IValidationResultCreationApi.class)
                                      groovy.lang.Closure<?> code)
        Activates the IValidationResultCreationApi to create IValidationResult in script task, which provide a resultSink.

        Note: this is only possible during script task execution, and when the script task provides a resultSink.

        Parameters:
        code - code to execute with the result creation API
        See Also:
        IValidationResultCreationApi
